data.title: ABOUT — Celebrate Arkansas
data.text:
ABOUT US

Our Vision:

Be the premier media and marketing source in Arkansas, connecting people, places & culture.

Our Mission:

To provide relevant media, celebrating the human element of the businesses, nonprofits, and people who make Arkansas a vibrant place to live.

Celebrate Arkansas Magazine began in November 2003 to celebrate the entrepreneurial spirit of Northwest Arkansas. Almost 20 years and 225 issues later, Celebrate Arkansas continues to feature Arkansas' finest businesses, entrepreneurs, and lifestyles each month. Available throughout local retailers such as Walmart, Barnes and Noble, Sam's Club, and more, Celebrate Arkansas also extends its reach throughout Northwest Arkansas through its subscription-based service.

WYLEY ELLIOTT — Editor-in-Chief

Nickname: Will

Favorite Movie Star: Sandra Bullock

Favorite pastime: Swimming

Greatest advice ever received: In all things choose “joy.”

Unique feature: Military walk

Born: Bentonville, Ark.

Raised: Cabot, Ark.

Education: University of Arkansas and Ouachita Baptist University

Aspiration: Be more like my dad

Greatest moment in life: The day I married my wife

Favorite sports team: Arkansas Razorbacks

Most admired famous person: Sam Walton

Favorite Movie: Titanic

Pet Peeve: Mean people

Quote: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

Who shares your birthday: George H. W. Bush

Favorite publication, other than CA: People magazine

JOCELYN MURPHY — Managing Editor

Nickname: Joc (but only if I like you)

Favorite Movie Star: Sandra Bullock, Nicole Kidman

Favorite pastime: Board games with friends

Greatest advice ever received: Don't make decisions based on those who will be disappointed by that choice; instead on whether you will disappoint yourself

Born: Memphis, Tenn.

Raised: Memphis and St. Louis

Education: University of Arkansas — dual concentration in Print/Editorial and Broadcast Journalism

Aspiration: To write a book, and to travel the world

Greatest moment in life: My youngest brother asking me to be a groomswoman in his wedding party, and having the honor of standing with both my brothers as the first of our three siblings got married.

Favorite Food: Donuts and steak...but not together

Favorite Movie: When Harry Met Sally, and The Holiday

Pet Peeve: Spoilers for brand new movies or TV episodes

Quote: She believed she could, so she did.

Who shares your birthday: Maggie Gyllenhaal, Pete Davidson

Favorite publication, other than CA: Travel + Leisure Magazine

ALEXA WILLIAMS — Director of Growth & Development

Nickname: ARae

Favorite Movie Star: Matthew McConaughey

Favorite pastime: Sunday Family Pizza & Movie Night

Greatest advice ever received: You can be anything, but you can’t be everything

Born: Little Rock, AR

Raised: Washington D.C., Ft. Hood Texas, Booneville Arkansas, Cabot Arkansas (Army Brat)

Education: Master's of Business Administration, University of Central Arkansas

Aspiration: Have a Christmas Tree Farm

Greatest moment in life: Marrying Taylor Williams and becoming a mom

Favorite sports team: Razorback Baseball Team

Most admired famous person: Condoleezza Rice

Favorite Movie: It’s a Wonderful Life & Harry Potter Movies

Pet Peeve: Slow Drivers

Quote: “Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts” - Winston Churchill

Who shares your birthday: Vince Lombardi and Joe Montana (apparently, I should’ve played football)

Favorite publication, other than CA: The Magnolia Journal

DANIEL YEAGER — Senior Graphic Designer

Nickname: Daniel (My first name is actually William)

Favorite Movie Star: Jim Carrey

Favorite pastime: Bike rides

Greatest advice ever received: My Uncle Ben once told me, “With great power, comes great responsibility."

Unique feature: I'm a ginger

Born: Rogers, Ark.

Raised: Bentonville, Ark.

Education: NorthWest Arkansas Community College

Aspiration: To be like my friends at Celebrate Arkansas.

Greatest moment in life: Day of salvation

Favorite sports team: “We like sports and we don’t care who knows."

Most admired famous person: Jesus

Favorite Movie: Eternal Sunshine of a Spotless Mind

Pet Peeve: Tardiness

Quote: Jesus + Nothing = Everything

Who shares your birthday: Peter Parker (Probably not but lets just say he does)

Favorite publication, other than CA: The Amazing Spider-Man comics

BILL BROTHERS — Brand Ambassador

Nickname: Bill (William is my formal name)

Favorite Movie Star: Robin Williams

Favorite pastime: Travel

Greatest advice ever received: Measure twice; cut once.

Unique feature: Left handed

Born: Hannibal, Mo.

Raised: Several places, but mainly Joplin, Mo.

Education: Kansas State University

Aspiration: To be a good husband and father

Greatest moment in life: Seeing our kids grow up to be great adults

Favorite sports team: St. Louis Cardinals

Most admired famous person: Mother Theresa

Favorite Movie: Field of Dreams

Pet Peeve: Rude people

Quote: “No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.” -Abraham Lincoln

Who shares your birthday: Sam Elliott

Favorite publication, other than CA: ESPN magazine

AARYN WHITNEY — Social Media Coordinator

Nickname: AA, Little Wyley

Favorite Movie Star: Reese Witherspoon

Favorite pastime: Talking and traveling

Greatest advice ever received: “Only one life, ’twill soon be past, only what’s done for Christ will last.” -C.T Studd

Born: Mountain Home, Arkansas

Raised: Spa City (Hot Springs) & Bentonville

Education: Ouachita Baptist University

Aspiration: Point people to Jesus and make the best ever homemade biscuits!

Greatest moment in life: Walking down the aisle with my daddy to marry my husband Clark and the birth of my son Baylor!

Favorite sports team: #WPS

Favorite Movie: Pride & Prejudice

Pet Peeve: When someone messages me on Facebook Messenger but has my phone number.

Quote: "The difference between a weed and a flower is perspective." -My morning tea bag quote

Who shares your birthday: Cher

Favorite publication, other than CA: Better Homes & Gardens Magazine
